name: RedSlash
description:
Red Slash is an endless action game where you fight wraiths to get a high score. Every successful hit will reset Red's jumps and attack, helps you perform longer combos.  The longer the combo, the powerful the skill pop-up!

Controls:
A - move left
D - move right
J - Slash
K - Jump / Double Jump / Glide

This game was made in 3 days for the GameDev Insiders Jam #1.
Theme: If you stop, you die.
